whatIs.title: What is Steal a Brainrot?
whatIs.description: Steal a Brainrot is a fun, chaotic, and unique fast-paced game on Roblox where players compete to steal a valuable object called "Brainrot" from each other while protecting their own.
whatIs.rules: The rules are simple: grab as many brainrots as you can, use power-ups strategically, and overcome your opponents to climb the leaderboards. This game is perfect for quick matches with friends or random players online, offering infinite fun and unpredictable moments.
whatIs.conclusion: Its simple premise makes the Steal a Brainrot experience accessible to everyone, and our assistance tool is here to guide you.

fastPaced.description: Quick and energetic matches, every moment is full of energy

howToPlay.title: How to Play Steal a Brainrot

objective.title: Game Objective
objective.description: The objective is simple: steal as many brainrots as possible while protecting your own! Success requires a combination of speed, strategy, and a bit of luck.

controls.title: Basic Controls
controls.movementDesc: Use WASD or arrow keys to navigate the map
controls.jumpDesc: Press the spacebar to jump over obstacles and evade opponents
controls.stealDesc: Approach other players and use the interaction key to grab their brainrot
controls.powerupsDesc: Activate special items to gain strategic advantages

protect.question: How do I protect my Brainrot?
protect.answer: The best way is to stay in motion, use power-ups defensively, and know the map. A player who moves constantly and is aware of their surroundings is much harder to attack.

codes.question: Are there codes or rewards in the game?
codes.answer: Currently there are no active promotional codes. Developers may release codes during special events, so make sure to follow the official game announcements.

improve.question: How can I improve at the game?
improve.answer: Practice is key! Focus on mastering movement, learning map layouts, and understanding when to use power-ups.

rebirths.question: What are Rebirths?
rebirths.answer: Rebirths are a central mechanism for progressing in Steal a Brainrot. By sacrificing your current progress, you gain permanent improvements.

segundoPiso.title: How to Reach the Second Floor
segundoPiso.subtitle: Master parkour on the Downtown map and gain a tactical advantage with our step-by-step guide

step1.title: Preparation and Location
step1.description: Before attempting to reach the second floor, you need to prepare properly. Locate yourself on the Downtown map and find the main building.
step1.tipDetail: Make sure you have at least 3 lives before attempting this challenge. Parkour can be frustrating at first.

step2.title: The Critical First Jump
step2.description: The first jump is the most important. You need to jump from the roof of the main building to the first platform.
instructions: Climb to the roof of the main building
Align your character with the edge

step3.title: Movement Sequence
step3.description: Once on the first platform, you must follow a specific sequence of movements to reach the second floor.
step3.warningDetail: Don't rush. Each movement must be precise. One mistake can make you fall and lose lives.

step4.title: The Final Jump
step4.description: The last jump is the most challenging. You need to calculate the distance and timing perfectly.
instructions: Position yourself on the last platform
Calculate the distance to the second floor
Land smoothly on the second floor

step5.title: You Reached the Second Floor!
step5.description: Congratulations! You've completed the most difficult challenge in the game. Now you have access to exclusive rewards.
step5.rewardDetail: You gain access to rare characters, special power-ups, and a significant advantage over other players.

timing.title: Perfect Timing
timing.description: Timing is crucial for success in this challenge.

strategy.title: Movement Strategy
strategy.description: Develop a solid strategy before attempting the challenge.

equipment.title: Recommended Equipment
equipment.description: Proper equipment can make a difference.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: Teamwork can make the challenge easier.

list.title: Premature Jump
list.description: Trying to jump before being completely aligned.
list.solution: Wait until you're perfectly aligned before jumping.

list.title: Lack of Patience
list.solution: Take your time and stay calm.

list.title: Ignoring Timing
list.description: Not paying attention to jump timing.
list.solution: Practice timing until it becomes natural.

list.title: Not Using Power-ups
list.description: Attempting the challenge without assistance power-ups.

questions.question: How long does it take to learn this trick?
questions.answer: It depends on your experience, but most players need 2-3 hours of practice.

questions.question: Is it possible to do it without power-ups?
questions.answer: Yes, but it's extremely difficult. Using speed power-ups is recommended.

questions.question: What happens if I fail and lose all my lives?
questions.answer: You can try again after regenerating lives or use life codes.

questions.question: Are there special rewards on the second floor?
questions.answer: Yes, there are rare characters and exclusive power-ups that can only be found there.

segundoPiso.title: How to Reach the Second Floor
segundoPiso.subtitle: Master parkour skills on the downtown map and gain tactical advantage

step1.title: 1. Starting Location
step1.description: The starting point is located in the southwest corner of the Downtown map. Look for a small elevated platform near the main fountain.
step1.tip: üí° Tip: Make sure there are no other players nearby before starting the parkour.

step2.title: 2. First Jump - Small Platform
step2.description: From the initial platform, jump to the right towards a small rectangular platform. This is the easiest jump but requires precision.

instructions.step3: Don't press the jump too hard

step3.title: 3. Second Jump - Medium Platform
step3.description: From the first platform, jump forward towards a larger platform. This jump requires more momentum.
step3.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: If you fall here, you'll have to go back to the start.

step4.title: 4. Third Jump - The Challenge
step4.description: This is the most difficult jump. From the medium platform, you need to jump towards a higher and more distant platform.

step5.title: 5. Final Platform
step5.description: Once on the highest platform, jump to the right to reach the second floor. Congratulations! You've completed the parkour.
step5.reward: üéâ Reward: From the second floor you have a strategic view of the map and access to exclusive power-ups.

timing.title: Perfect Timing
timing.description: Practice the timing of your jumps. A well-timed jump can save you valuable seconds.

powerups.title: Using Power-ups
powerups.description: Consider using speed power-ups before starting the parkour to make jumps easier.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

questions.question: When should I do my first Rebirth?
questions.answer: It is recommended to do the first Rebirth after reaching level 50 and having accumulated sufficient resources.

questions.question: Do I lose all my progress when doing Rebirth?
questions.answer: Yes, you lose your current progress but gain permanent bonuses that will make you stronger.

questions.question: Are Rebirth benefits permanent?
questions.answer: Yes, all bonuses obtained from Rebirth are permanent and accumulate with each Rebirth.

faq.defaultAnswer: Rebirth is a system that allows sacrificing current progress for permanent bonuses.

questions.answer: Luck is a multiplier that increases the probability of finding rare characters. It accumulates over time and through activities.

questions.question: Do spawn rates change?
questions.answer: Base rates remain constant, but special events can modify them temporarily.

questions.question: What's the best strategy for mythic characters?
questions.answer: Maximize your luck, participate in events, and maintain a consistent gaming routine.

faq.defaultAnswer: Complete missions, collect characters, and participate in events to increase your luck.

tips.title: Important Tips
tips.description: Remember that luck accumulates over time. Be patient and consistent in your strategy.
